document.getElementById('submit-avis-test').addEventListener('click', async () => { try { const response = await fetch('https://n8n.c1euro.com/webhook-test/avis', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ email: 'test@example.com', product_id: 'produit-test-123', review: 'Ceci est un avis de test', page: window.location.href }) }); const data = await response.json(); if (data.status === 'approved') { const popup = document.createElement('div'); popup.style = 'position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; background: rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.7); color: white; display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 10px 5%; box-sizing: border-box; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); z-index: 9999; flex-wrap: nowrap; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;'; popup.innerHTML = `

‚úÖ Votre commentaire a bien √©t√© d√©pos√© !

Merci pour votre confiance

`; document.body.appendChild(popup); setTimeout(() => { popup.style.opacity = '1'; popup.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'; }, 10); } else if (data.status === 'not_purchased') { const popup = document.createElement('div'); popup.style = 'position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; background: rgba(220, 53, 69, 0.9); color: white; display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 10px 5%; box-sizing: border-box; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); z-index: 9999; flex-wrap: nowrap; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); transition: opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;'; popup.innerHTML = `

‚ùå Avis non publi√©

Vous n'avez jamais command√© chez nous

`; document.body.appendChild(popup); setTimeout(() => { popup.style.opacity = '1'; popup.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'; }, 10); } } catch (err) { console.error(err); alert('üö® Erreur de communication avec le serveur.'); } });
